mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_TASKS ( TASK_ID, USER_ID, SECTOR_ID, SECTOR_TYPE, TASK_TITLE, TASK_DESC, TASK_DEADLINE, TASK_TYPE, TASK_TOTAL_PAID, TASK_ADDR, TASK_LONGITUDE, TASK_LATITUDE, TASK_ICON1, TASK_ICON2, TASK_ICON3, TASK_ICON4, TASK_AUDIT_STATUS, TASK_BID_STATUS, TASK_CREATE_TIME, TASK_AREA ) VALUES ( #{TASK_ID}, #{USER_ID}, #{SECTOR_ID}, #{SECTOR_TYPE}, #{TASK_TITLE}, #{TASK_DESC}, #{TASK_DEADLINE}, #{TASK_TYPE}, #{TASK_PAID,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{TASK_ADDR}, #{TASK_LONGITUDE,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{TASK_LATITUDE,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{TASK_ICON1}, #{TASK_ICON2}, #{TASK_ICON3}, #{TASK_ICON4}, #{TASK_AUDIT_STATUS}, #{TASK_BID_STATUS}, #{TASK_CREATE_TIME}, #{TASK_AREA} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_TASKS SET SECTOR_ID=#{SECTOR_ID}, SECTOR_TYPE=#{SECTOR_TYPE}, TASK_TITLE=#{TASK_TITLE}, TASK_DESC=#{TASK_DESC}, TASK_DEADLINE=#{TASK_DEADLINE}, TASK_TYPE=#{TASK_TYPE}, TASK_TOTAL_PAID=#{TASK_TOTAL_PAID,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TASK_ADDR=#{TASK_ADDR}, TASK_LONGITUDE=#{TASK_LONGITUDE,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TASK_LATITUDE=#{TASK_LATITUDE,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TASK_ICON1=#{TASK_ICON1}, TASK_ICON2=#{TASK_ICON2}, TASK_ICON3=#{TASK_ICON3}, TASK_ICON4=#{TASK_ICON4}, TASK_AREA=#{TASK_AREA} WHERE TASK_ID = #{TASK_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*,B.USER_NAME,B.USER_ICON FROM T_TASKS A, T_USERS B WHERE A.TASK_ID = #{TASK_ID} AND A.TASK_AUDIT_STATUS = '20' AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.TASK_BID_STATUS != '80'

SELECT A.*,B.USER_NAME,B.USER_ICON,C.BID_TIME,C.IS_BIDE, SQRT(POWER(#{LONGITUDE, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-A.TASK_LONGITUDE,2)+POWER(#{LATITUDE, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-A.TASK_LATITUDE,2)) * 140000 DIST FROM T_TASKS A, T_USERS B, T_TASKS_LINE C WHERE A.TASK_AUDIT_STATUS = '20' AND A.TASK_BID_STATUS != '80' AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.TASK_ID = C.TASK_ID AND C.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND C.STATUS = '10'
AND C.IS_BIDE = #{IS_BIDE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_TASKS_MESSAGE ( MSG_ID, TASK_ID, USER_ID, TIME1, MESSAGE, REPLY ) VALUES ( #{MSG_ID}, #{TASK_ID}, #{USER_ID}, #{TIME1}, #{MESSAGE}, #{REPLY} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.MSG_ID,A.USER_ID,B.USER_NAME,B.USER_ICON,A.TIME1,A.MESSAGE,A.REPLY FROM T_TASKS_MESSAGE A,T_USERS B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.TASK_ID = #{TASK_ID}
